text: Greenville Junction is an unincorporated village in the town of Greenville, Piscataquis County, Maine, United States. The community is located along Maine State Route 6 and the south shore of Moosehead Lake northwest of Dover- Foxcroft. Greenville Junction has a post office with ZIP code 04442. ==References== Category:Villages in Piscataquis County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: Greenville Junction, Maine
